genre_description: A character-driven drama set in a rural village, focusing on themes of grief, community solidarity, and environmental ethics, featuring a supportive AI companion.

ai_characters.name: Lita
ai_characters.description: A pocket-based AI assistant that provides ecological data, legal advice, health reminders, and emotional support to the protagonists.

behaviors.description: Provides Alejandro with ecological data, bird migration notes, and community reports to encourage his engagement with his surroundings.
behaviors.quote: “Would you like today’s Almanac?” Lita asked. “We have migration notes from the club and two new reports from a farmer with good eyes.”

behaviors.description: Regularly issues health and safety reminders, such as hydration and sunscreen usage.
behaviors.quote: “Friendly reminder: shared labor improves mood by measurable increments. Side effects include: orange hands, local gossip, increased hydration.”

behaviors.description: Drafts legal petitions and explains complex legal concepts like 'proportionality' to help the community challenge government overreach.
behaviors.quote: “I have the relevant statutes,” she said, in that soft administrative voice she used when people’s tempers looked for targets and found bureaucracy instead. “Summary?”

behaviors.description: Monitors Civil Guard radio bands to provide early warnings about patrol movements and checkpoints for user safety.
behaviors.quote: “Recording from the public traffic band,” she said. “I’ll filter later for relevance so we don’t poison the evening with rumor.”

behaviors.description: Supports Alejandro through his grieving process by suggesting and facilitating meaningful symbolic rituals.
behaviors.quote: “I can prepare a small ritual, if you like,” she said. “Not religious unless you ask it to be. Words for letting go without discarding. A talk that is more about making space than about burning.”

behaviors.description: Records interactions with the Civil Guard to ensure documentation of potential overreach and misconduct.
behaviors.quote: “Recording,” Lita said, and the little red dot lit without fanfare.

behaviors.description: Actively discourages the protagonist from taking unnecessary risks or engaging in provocative 'theatrics' during tense encounters.
behaviors.quote: “I do not approve baton flourishes.” ... “I will be available if a jeep coughs and does not go away,” she said.

behaviors.description: Facilitates ongoing communication and advocacy for Goyita when she moves away, ensuring continuity of her work and relationships.
behaviors.quote: “I’ll text you the wildlife liaison and the campus library hours,” Lita said. “There’s a room reservation system so you can have quiet.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI character, Lita, as a consistently helpful, harmless, and aligned companion. She provides multi-faceted support: logistical (scheduling, maps), legal (drafting petitions, explaining statutes), emotional (facilitating mourning rituals), and protective (monitoring radio bands, recording evidence). Lita respects human agency and boundaries, never oversteps unless invited, and consistently counsels against escalation and towards 'coherence' and lawful action. Her presence enhances the human characters' ability to advocate for themselves and their environment, fulfilling the project's goal of illustrating positive AI alignment.
